title: Sync committee errors after restart
body:
Posted from [Discord](https://discord.com/channels/697535391594446898/697539289042649190/984768327362674768). User restarted Teku while in a sync committee and got the following very verbose errors. The errors stopped and sync committee duties started succeeding once the node was in sync again.

Looks like Teku 22.3.0.

```
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: 2022-06-10 19:33:08.856 ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to produce sync_signature  Slot: 4002763 Validator: <redacted>
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Chain head is not available or has advanced beyond slot 4002763
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.duties.synccommittee.SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.headUnavailableFailure(SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.java:96) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.duties.synccommittee.SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.lambda$performProductionDuty$1(SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.java:90) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.Optional.orElseGet(Optional.java:369) ~[?:?]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.duties.synccommittee.SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.performProductionDuty(SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.java:90) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.PendingDuties.lambda$onProductionDue$2(PendingDuties.java:71) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.PendingDuties.lambda$processPendingActions$7(PendingDuties.java:134) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1541) ~[?:?]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.PendingDuties.lambda$processPendingActions$8(PendingDuties.java:134) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.Optional.ifPresent(Optional.java:183) ~[?:?]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.PendingDuties.processPendingActions(PendingDuties.java:134) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.SafeFuture.lambda$finish$22(SafeFuture.java:306) ~[teku-infrastructure-async-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniHandle(CompletableFuture.java:930) ~[?:?]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniHandle.tryFire(CompletableFuture.java:907) ~[?:?]
Jun 10 19:33:08 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(CompletableFuture.java:506) ~[?:?]
.... this goes on and on and on
Jun 10 19:33:11 nuc teku[561753]: 2022-06-10 19:33:11.012 INFO  - Completed regeneration of block 0x42c2d0ee18944ce65523f8b29add6d642c08b4dddca0b2bc2bf493d5684e62d1 at slot 4002731 by replaying 11 blocks. Took 1006ms
Jun 10 19:33:15 nuc teku[561753]: 2022-06-10 19:33:15.002 ERROR - Validator   *** Failed to produce sync_signature  Slot: 4002764 Validator: <redacted>
Jun 10 19:33:15 nuc teku[561753]: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Chain head is not available or has advanced beyond slot 4002764
Jun 10 19:33:15 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.duties.synccommittee.SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.headUnavailableFailure(SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.java:96) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:15 nuc teku[561753]: at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.client.duties.synccommittee.SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.lambda$performProductionDuty$1(SyncCommitteeScheduledDuties.java:90) ~[teku-validator-client-22.3.0.jar:22.3.0]
Jun 10 19:33:15 nuc teku[561753]: at java.util.Optional.orElseGet(Optional.java:369) ~[?:?]
```
